name: ghost_fetch
description: Fetch content from any URL using a stealthy headless browser. Bypasses anti-bot protections and returns clean markdown with metadata. Use the sync endpoint or this async version with polling.

url.description: The URL of the page to fetch (e.g. an X.com post or a protected news article).

context_id.description: Optional persistent session ID. Use this to maintain cookies and a consistent browser fingerprint across multiple requests to the same site.

timeout.description: Maximum time to wait in seconds (default: 120). Only used with sync endpoint.
